title: IVR-Based Immersive Science Education Course Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science education and understanding of pedagogical methodologies
context.additional_context: Enhancing competencies in designing and operating science lessons using IVR technology for pre-service/in-service teachers

learning_goals: Cultivating the ability to design science experiment simulations in IVR-based learning environments
Enhancing the ability to apply components of the Immersive Learning Model (ILMU), including learning design, technology, and immersion levels
Acquiring skills to produce and operate IVR content in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment
Developing and presenting IVR science class models through project-based assessment
Establishing strategies for utilizing IVR technology to enhance learner engagement and interaction
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
